00119 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00120 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateModel() const
00121 {
00122        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00123 
00124        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00125        I_ASSERT(objectPtr != NULL);
00126 
00127        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(objectPtr);
00128 
00129        int count = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
00130        objectPtr->Clear();
00131 
00132        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00133               double x = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_X)->text().toDouble();
00134               double y = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_Y)->text().toDouble();
00135        
00136               objectPtr->InsertNode(i2d::CVector2d(x, y));
00137        }
00138 }

00150 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00151 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnInsertNode()
00152 {
00153        iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
00154 
00155        int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
00156        if (row < 0){
00157               row = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
00158               
00159               NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(row + 1);
00160        }
00161        else{
00162               NodeParamsTable->insertRow(row);
00163        }
00164 
00165        NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_X, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00166        NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_Y, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00167        NodeParamsTable->setCurrentCell(row, 0);
00168 
00169        DoUpdateModel();
00170 }

00173 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00174 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnCopyData()
00175 {
00176        PolygonBasedModel* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<PolygonBasedModel*>(GetObjectPtr());
00177        if (objectPtr == NULL){
00178               return;
00179        }
00180 
00181        iser::CMemoryWriteArchive archive;
00182 
00183        if (objectPtr->Serialize(archive)){
00184               QByteArray data((const char*)archive.GetBuffer(), archive.GetBufferSize());
00185 
00186               QMimeData* dataPtr = new QMimeData();
00187               dataPtr->setData(typeid(PolygonBasedModel).name(), data);
00188 
00189               QApplication::clipboard()->setMimeData(dataPtr);
00190        }
00191 }

00194 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00195 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnPasteData()
00196 {
00197        PolygonBasedModel* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<PolygonBasedModel*>(GetObjectPtr());
00198        if (objectPtr == NULL){
00199               return;
00200        }
00201 
00202        const QMimeData* dataPtr = QApplication::clipboard()->mimeData();
00203        if (dataPtr != NULL){
00204               if (dataPtr->hasFormat(typeid(PolygonBasedModel).name())){
00205                      QByteArray data(dataPtr->data(typeid(PolygonBasedModel).name()));
00206 
00207                      iser::CMemoryReadArchive archive(data.data(), data.size());
00208 
00209                      objectPtr->Serialize(archive);
00210               }
00211        }
00212 }

00215 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00216 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnRemoveNode()
00217 {
00218        int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
00219        if (row >= 0){
00220               iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
00221 
00222               NodeParamsTable->removeRow(row);
00223 
00224               DoUpdateModel();
00225        }
00226 }

00249 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00250 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateGui(int /*updateFlags*/)
00251 {
00252        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00253 
00254        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00255        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00256               NodeParamsTable->clearContents();
00257 
00258               int count = objectPtr->GetNodesCount();
00259               NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(count);
00260 
00261               for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00262                      i2d::CVector2d coord = objectPtr->GetNode(i);
00263                      NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 0, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetX())));
00264                      NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 1, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetY())));
00265               }
00266        }
00267 }

00280        NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(0, columnDelegate);
00281        NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(1, columnDelegate);
00282 }
